oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dairy diagnostics 101
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Goodell, Greg M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diagnostic
dairy
mastitis
abortion
BVD
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper will discuss the ever-changing world of diagnostics in dairy veterinary practice and point out a few things that vet足erinarians should know concerning test selection and test type. It will be focused primarily on diagnostics for herd-level prob足lems of dairy cattle and will touch on mastitis, abortion and BVD. In addition, some time will be allocated to a brief over足view on PCR and advances in culturing. The remaining content of this paper will focus on diagnostic sampling strategies for common dairy herd problems, some disease investigation, rou足tine sampling and interpretation of results.
